de.tu_dresden.psy.regexp

Class SplittedStringRelation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tu_dresden.psy.regexp.SplittedStringRelation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StringRelationInterface

    public class SplittedStringRelation
extends java.lang.Object
implements StringRelationInterface
    implements a multiple chain pattern splitter that is able to map the splittings to new strings using multiple formulae
    Author:
    albrecht

      implements the (graceful) projection of a part of a splitting
      static class  SplittedStringRelation.RegexpToTokenMap
      implements a map which will send a string to some token, in case that some given regexp matches the string.
      static class  SplittedStringRelation.SplittedStringProjectionMap
